Description: 50% Broker's Fee No Security Deposit needed Rent Includes heat and hot water! Front facing 1BR apartment in the heart of Fenway. Minutes from public transportation, Longwood Medical Area, restaurants, shopping and more! This unit features hardwood flooring. An updated/renovated kitchen with dishwasher. Large windows to allow for natural light. Laundry located on site. Available September 1!
